judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Schaffer, Maxes, Drew, Linn and Barnes, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
This case was correctly determined by the orphans’ court sitting in banc, as will appear by that part of the opinion of Judge Stearns set forth in the reporter’s notes.
Decree affirmed at appellants’ cost.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Maurice Heckscher, of Duane, Morris & Heckscher, for appellants.
Samuel B. Scott, of Scott & Burton, for Girard Trust Co., appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Warren’s Estate.
Argued December 2, 1935.
Before Frazer, C. J., Schaffer, Maxes, Drew, Linn and Barnes, JJ.
January 6, 1936:
Maurice Heckscher, of Duane, Morris & Heckscher, for appellants.
Henry O. Remick, for appellee.
Samuel B. Scott, of Scott & Burton, for Girard Trust Co., appellee.
